thread.title: Pietro’s Trattoria in Lodi serves up garden-fresh dishes

author: Lauren Nelson
title: Pietro’s Trattoria in Lodi serves up garden-fresh dishes
text:
Photo: Preston Gannaway, Special To The Chronicle 8544199|article-6485369|7 8544199|article-6485369|1 email_share_embed|photo-8544199|article-6485369|1 8544199|article-6485369|2 8544199|article-6485369|3 8544199|article-6485369|4 8544199|article-6485369|5 google_share_embed|photo-8544199|article-6485369|6 At Pietro’s Trattoria in Lodi, limes hang from branches in the garden. At Pietro’s Trattoria in Lodi, limes hang from branches in the...
The delta breeze is picking up, rustling leaves on vines heavy with Early Girl and beefsteak tomatoes. The spicy aroma of ripening green bell peppers wafts through the garden at Pietro’s Trattoria. At Pietro’s Trattoria in Lodi, limes hang from branches in the garden. At Pietro’s Trattoria in Lodi, limes hang from branches in the...
The delta breeze is picking up, rustling leaves on vines heavy with Early Girl and beefsteak tomatoes. The spicy aroma of ripening green bell peppers wafts through the garden at Pietro’s Trattoria.
